channel.title: I made some commands if any one wants them

item.title: I made some commands if any one wants them
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

For “starter”

Add this:

[code]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 1000000);
sendMessage(“You’ll have to earn more stuff”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Greediness come with consquenses”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " Is a Noob Who Tried Getting 2 Starters :o kill him.");

}

}[/code]

xD

Read full topic

item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

I think you want it to say to everyone ‘’ apllayer is teleporting to the wilderniss KILL HIM! "

use this code for it and not sendmessage that will only tell the player himself

	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName+" Is teleporting To ::Wildernissgate Kill him! ";

item.title: I made some commands if any one wants them
item.dc:creator: @JadeScape JadeScape
item.description:
@JadeScape wrote:

Features Wilderness tele
freakyforester tele (teles you to the area where the freaky forster event happens)
starter (gives you 1m)
admincommandscash (admin gets 999m)

[code]if (command.startsWith(“Wildernessgate”))
{
sendMessage(“a player is teleporting to the wilderness KILL HIM!”);
teleportToX = 3248;
teleportToY = 3500;
}

if (command.startsWith(“freakyForester”))
{
sendMessage(“A player did the command ::freakyforester!”);
teleportToX = 2596;
teleportToY = 4780;
}

if (command.startsWith(“Starter”))
{
sendMessage(“A player Just got there first starter pack to get yours type ::starter”);
addItem(995 1000000);
}

if (command.startsWith(“Admincommandscash”))
{
sendMessage(“An Admin Just Spawned Cash (cheater…)”);
addItem(995 9999999999);
} [/code]

Read full topic
